title: New: Lemonade – Neptune
body:
Photo by [Vianna Nguyen](http://cargocollective.com/forlovers)

The new track from [**Lemonade**’s](https://www.facebook.com/lemonadetheband) sophomore LP, **_Driver_**, is a glistening and sober reinvention of their original sound, last heard in their 2010 EP, **_Pure Moods_**. The scattered essence of their debunked scope is omnipresent, however noticeably with a wavered and lonely undercurrent. Hollow and tropical beats seem to exist in the most emotionally divergent of ways, they plod along despite the sadness, and meanwhile a torn and interceptive outpour of emotions ensues.

Whatever happened before the track; the fun is most definitely over.

From **_Diver_**; out 05/29/12 through [True Panther](http://www.truepanther.com/)
